title: SysFileGetPath (Function)
text:
FUNCTION SysFileGetPath : RTS_IEC_RESULT
Get the path of this file.
If a path is specified in the filename, the path will be extracted from the filename.
If no path is specified in the filename, the standard path for this file extension type will be returned.

rows.Name: SysFileGetPath
rows.Comment: The runtime system error code (see CmpErrors.library)

rows.Name: szFileName
rows.Comment: File name. Can contain an absolute or relative path

rows.Name: diMaxLen
rows.Comment: Maximum size in bytes of path length
